mapper.sql: select FORUM_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, REPORT_NAME, REPORT_TIME, VENUE, REPORTER_NAME, REPORTER_ID, INSPECTION_GROUP_PERSON_NAME, INSPECTION_GROUP_PERSON_ID, REPORT_PERSON_NAME, REPORT_PERSON_ID, MEETING_DESC, APPROVAL_FLAG, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID from inspection_forum
mapper.select: select u.UNITS_ID,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.created_time,count(d.UNITS_ID) as count from inspection_units u left join inspection_forum d on u.UNITS_ID = d.UNITS_ID where u.plan_id = #{planId} group by u.UNITS_ID

select FORUM_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, REPORT_NAME, REPORT_TIME, VENUE, REPORTER_NAME, REPORTER_ID, INSPECTION_GROUP_PERSON_NAME, INSPECTION_GROUP_PERSON_ID, REPORT_PERSON_NAME, REPORT_PERSON_ID, MEETING_DESC, APPROVAL_FLAG, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, f.CREATED_BY as 'f.CREATED_BY ', f.CREATED_TIME as 'f.CREATED_TIME', f.UPDATED_BY as 'f.UPDATED_BY', f.UPDATED_TIME as 'f.UPDATED_TIME', f.ENT_ID as 'f.ENT_ID', doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_forum f left join piis_document doc on concat('Forum', f.FORUM_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where f.FORUM_ID = #{forumId}
